name: FATMAX Tape Measure
description: FATMAX tape fits your toolbelt,your hand,and the job. It's engineered to fit comfortably in the palm of your hand with baseball-inspired grip, and equipped with our patented Twin-Core™ technology for a compact case design.

name: Brushless Cordless 5-in-1 Drill Kit
description: Take on a wide range of drilling jobs with the incredible versatility offered by the XTREME™ 12V MAX* Brushless Cordless 5-in-1 Drill/Driver Kit.

name: Cutting Blade Size: 10 Inch, 1600W
description: This Saw Blades are ideal for any wood-cutting application. The exclusive,patent-pending ToughTrack™ tooth design, on our framing & ripping blades, is engineered to deliver straight, accurate cuts over the life of the blade.

name: 3 lb Fiberglass Drilling Hammer
description: This 3 lb. fiberglass drilling hammer offers a concentrated strike face for superior impact. With its forged steel body, this sledge hammer is built tough to withstand those outdoor, rugged conditions.

name: 380mm x 11TPI Blade Armour Saw
description: This heavy-duty FATMAX® 15 saw is designed to deliver smooth, sharp cuts. It features triple ground jet cut teeth that are engineered for fast cutting and has a BladeArmor®-coated blade to help reduce friction and binding

name: 30 pc Ratcheting Screwdriver Set
description: Complete a variety of fastening jobs quickly and easily with the STANLEY® 30 pc. Multi-Bit Ratcheting Screwdriver Set. The ratcheting mechanism is able to be placed in a forward, reversed or locked position.

name: 51 pc Mixed Tool Set
description: This 51 piece mixed tool set is great for a homeowner. It includes an array of tools from a tape measure to a ratchet, perfect for home repair.The ratchet has 72 teeth making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces.

name: Folding Hand Truck
description: Transport stock, equipment, and other heavy loads with the sturdy Folding Hand Truck. This adaptable utility cart folds and opens in seconds so you can minimize the time spent hauling goods in residential settings or in your workplace.

name: Retractable Utility Knife
description: Retractable Utility Knife features an optimized shape for applications that need a precise grip. The nose of the knife features an exposed blade step to speed up blade placement.

name: 4-3/8 in Jaw Capacity Quick Vise
description: Jaw Capacity Quick Vise is ideal for DIY and hobbyist projects. Rather than a traditional hand crank, the quick vise utilizes a slide for quick, easy positioning and a lever for tightening.
